repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: From what repositories the issues will be collected

spreadsheetId.title: Spreadsheet id
spreadsheetId.description: Id of the spreadsheet where you want to upload the issues

oneSheetPerRepository.title: One sheet per one repository
oneSheetPerRepository.description: If true, each repository will be uploaded to a sheet with the same name as the repository. YOU NEED TO HAVE THE SHEETS ALREADY CREATED!!!

googleOauthStore.title: Google OAuth tokens store
googleOauthStore.description: Key-value store where your Google OAuth tokens will be stored so you don't have to authorize every time again. By default it is google-oauth-tokens
